name: Toaplan Arcade Shoot'em Ups Ultimate Collection
name_original: Toaplan Arcade Shoot'em Ups Ultimate Collection
description:
Toaplan Arcade Shoot'em Ups Ultimate Collection includes:

  • Zero Wing
  • Twin Cobra
  • Out Zone
  • Truxton
  • Fire Shark
  • Flying Shark
  • Hellfire
  • Slap Fight
  • Tiger Heli
  • Batsugun
  • FixEight
  • Vimana
  • Dogyuun
  • Grind Storme
  • Truxton 2
  • Twin Hawk


      • ZAP! SPLAT! BANG! BOOM!

      The Toaplan Arcade Shoot'em Ups Ultimate Collection gives you four arcade classics for a great price! It's quadruple the action, a billion times the fun, and a thrill ride back in time to the neon-lit arcades of the 80s!

      With modern enhancements, leaderboards, screen filters, and quality-of-life extras, no threat stands between you and absolute victory. Got what it takes? Prove it on the battlefield!

      System requirements, bonus goodies, and features may vary between games - please check individual product pages for details.
